courseName: Cyber Security and Digital Forensics MSc (Distance Learning)
description: Additional intakes: 26 Feb ’24 and 20 May ‘24Programme start date: February, May and SeptemberCyber security aims to reduce the risk of cyber-attacks, and protect against the unauthorised exploitation of systems, networks and technologies. Whereas Digital forensics is focused on recovery and investigation of artefacts found on a digital device. Devices that store data include computers, laptops, smartphones, memory cards or external hard drives.
fees: FeesPlease see the course webpage for further information.
